content.rendered:
Company Registration(LLP Registration)

Get Started

What is Company Registration?

Company Registration is a legal process through which a business entity is formed as an independent legal personality. This legalises the business structure, it operates as a legal entity different from its owners with legal capacities, which can sue or be sued, enter into agreements and adhere to statutory conditions.

LLP Registration in the Context of Company Registration

Appointment of LLP in Company Registration is the procedure of incorporation of a Limited Liability Partnership as the legal business form under company law. An LLP is structurally a hybrid of a partnership firm and a limited company and has characteristics of both. By experiencing the advantage of the operational flexibility of partnership this structure gives the partners limited liability; their assets may not be affected by the company’s debt or legal obligations.

An LLP is not similar to other forms of company registration including private limited companies or sole traders. It is greatly preferred by occupation people such as lawyers, accountants and consultants with elements of both a partnership and a corporation.

How We Can Assist with Company and LLP Registration

We offer both Company Registration services and LLP Registration services that include information on the legal processes; documentation and filing processes. To make your registration process as painless as possible so that you can concentrate on your business affairs from the outset, we employ professionals in the field.

Lets Get Your Company Incorporated Today

Get Started
